Name: Inception
Description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets but faces challenges when planting an idea.

Name: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

Name: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

Name: Titanic
Description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love on the ill-fated Titanic ship.

Name: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against machines.

Name: Avengers: Endgame
Description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage caused by Thanos and save the universe.

Name: Parasite
Description: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences.

Name: Joker
Description: An aspiring stand-up comedian descends into madness and becomes the infamous Joker.

Name: Forrest Gump
Description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who unintentionally influences historical events.

Name: Gladiator
Description: A Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and forced into slavery.
